content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1/2 (1 ounce) square unsweetened chocolate, grated" )
( ing-8 "1/3 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration" )

content.text: 0) Preheat an oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "an oven"@11:18 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "300 degrees F"@22:35 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "150 degrees C"@37:50 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) In a small saucepan over medium heat, melt butter till lightly browned.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "melt"@41:45 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "butter"@46:52 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "till lightly browned"@53:73 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a small saucepan"@6:22 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "medium heat"@28:39 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Stir in the egg white, sugar and vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the egg white"@11:24 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "sugar"@26:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "vanilla"@36:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Combine the flour cocoa, and salt; mix into the butter mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the flour"@11:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "cocoa"@21:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "salt"@32:36 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "mix"@38:41 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "the butter mixture"@47:65 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Drop by teaspoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto cookie sheets.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Drop"@3:7 / AC
		:gol ( tool-7-0 "cookie sheets"@50:63 / TOOL )
		:mnr ( "teaspoonfuls"@11:23 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( "about 2 inches apart"@24:44 / OTHER )
)

content.text: 9) Transfer to rack to cool and dust with confectioners' sugar.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Transfer"@4:12 / AC
		:gol ( tool-9-0 "rack"@16:20 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-9-0 "to cool"@21:28 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-9-1 "dust"@33:37 / AC
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "confectioners' sugar"@43:63 / FOOD )
	)
)
